if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
	b="https://www.zfangchan.com";
  url=String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
result=java.ajax(b+java.ajax(url).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">下一章<\/a>/)[1]);
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
base="https://www.zfangchan.com";
lis=java.getElements('section ol li a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>
